image_1.entity_name: CROWD SURGE IN THE ITAEWON DISTRICT
image_1.description: The crowd surge in the Itaewon district of Seoul was a tragic event where over 150 people suffocated due to a crush in a narrow alleyway.
image_1.reason: The image depicts a memorial scene related to a tragic event in the Itaewon district of Seoul, with numerous white flowers, candles, and personal items indicating a somber and respectful atmosphere. The text provides context about the crowd surge that occurred during a Halloween celebration, resulting in numerous fatalities. The combination of the image and text clearly points to the 'Crowd Surge in the Itaewon District' as the most appropriate entity.
